name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of basic principles in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Fundamentals of fluid dynamics and its role in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Design
lessons.description: Introduction to airfoil shapes and their aerodynamic performance.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Characteristics and principles of subsonic flow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Understanding supersonic flow and its unique challenges.

lessons.name: Shock Waves
lessons.description: Exploring shock waves in supersonic flows and their effects on aerodynamics.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Effects in High-Speed Flight
lessons.description: Understanding the effects of high-speed flight on spacecraft and aircraft structures.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of materials and designs used for thermal protection in space vehicles.

lessons.name: Cooling Mechanisms
lessons.description: Cooling techniques used to mitigate aerodynamic heating effects.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding how loads affect spacecraft structure and design.

lessons.name: Material Selection
lessons.description: Choosing appropriate materials for spacecraft structural integrity.

lessons.name: Failure Modes and Analysis
lessons.description: Analyzing potential failure modes in spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Overview of the key elements defining an orbit.

lessons.name: Maneuvers and Transfers
lessons.description: Studying common orbital maneuvers and transfer methods.

lessons.name: Satellite Orbits
lessons.description: Understanding different types of satellite orbits and their applications.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Exploring the power generation and distribution systems in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Communication Systems
lessons.description: Understanding spacecraft communication systems and their design.

lessons.name: Propulsion Systems
lessons.description: Studying different spacecraft propulsion methods and their applications.

name: Introduction to Spacecraft Control Systems
description: Fundamentals of spacecraft attitude and control systems.

lessons.name: Attitude Control Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to spacecraft attitude control principles.

lessons.name: Control Systems Components
lessons.description: Overview of key components in spacecraft control systems.

lessons.name: Sensors and Actuators
lessons.description: Understanding the role of sensors and actuators in spacecraft control.

name: Advanced Control Methods
description: Study of advanced methods for controlling spacecraft orientation.

lessons.name: Feedback Control
lessons.description: Exploring feedback control methods in spacecraft systems.

lessons.name: Stability and Control
lessons.description: Analysis of stability in spacecraft control systems.

lessons.name: Modern Control Techniques
lessons.description: Application of modern control techniques to spacecraft.

name: Autonomous Spacecraft Navigation
description: Introduction to autonomous navigation techniques for spacecraft.

lessons.name: Autonomous Systems Overview
lessons.description: Overview of autonomous systems for spacecraft navigation.

lessons.name: Navigation Algorithms
lessons.description: Key algorithms for autonomous navigation in space.

lessons.name: GPS and Inertial Navigation
lessons.description: Using GPS and inertial systems for spacecraft navigation.

name: Space Environment
description: Understanding the space environment and its effects on spacecraft.

lessons.name: Radiation in Space
lessons.description: Study of space radiation and its impact on spacecraft.

lessons.name: Space Weather
lessons.description: Introduction to space weather and its effects on satellite operations.

lessons.name: Thermal Effects in Space
lessons.description: Understanding thermal effects on spacecraft in space.

name: Microgravity
description: Study of microgravity effects on spacecraft systems and crew.

lessons.name: Microgravity Overview
lessons.description: Basics of microgravity and its implications for space missions.

lessons.name: Effects on Human Physiology
lessons.description: Understanding how microgravity affects the human body.

lessons.name: Microgravity in Engineering
lessons.description: Challenges of engineering systems in a microgravity environment.

name: Orbital Debris
description: Understanding the challenges posed by orbital debris in space.

lessons.name: Debris Sources and Risks
lessons.description: Identifying sources of orbital debris and associated risks.

lessons.name: Debris Mitigation Strategies
lessons.description: Strategies for mitigating and avoiding orbital debris.

lessons.name: Debris Tracking and Removal
lessons.description: Techniques for tracking and removing space debris.

name: Planetary Exploration
description: Introduction to planetary exploration and mission design.

lessons.name: Mission Planning for Planetary Exploration
lessons.description: Overview of mission planning for planetary exploration.

lessons.name: Exploration Techniques
lessons.description: Techniques for exploring different planetary environments.

lessons.name: Rover Design
lessons.description: Introduction to the design of rovers for planetary exploration.

name: Mars Exploration
description: Detailed study of Mars exploration missions and their objectives.

lessons.name: Mars Missions
lessons.description: Overview of past and future Mars exploration missions.

lessons.name: Challenges of Mars Exploration
lessons.description: Identifying the key challenges in Mars exploration missions.

lessons.name: Mars Habitat Design
lessons.description: Design considerations for building habitats on Mars.

name: Lunar Exploration
description: Study of lunar exploration missions and human return to the Moon.

lessons.name: Apollo Missions
lessons.description: Detailed study of the Apollo missions to the Moon.

lessons.name: Lunar Base Design
lessons.description: Concepts and challenges in designing a permanent base on the Moon.

lessons.name: Future Lunar Exploration
lessons.description: Exploring the future of human and robotic missions to the Moon.

name: Human Spaceflight
description: Fundamentals of human spaceflight and associated challenges.

lessons.name: History of Human Spaceflight
lessons.description: Overview of the history and evolution of human spaceflight.

lessons.name: Life Support Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to life support systems for human space missions.

lessons.name: Space Suits and EVA
lessons.description: Understanding space suits and extravehicular activity (EVA).

name: Lunar Exploration
description: Study of lunar exploration missions and human return to the Moon.

lessons.name: Apollo Missions
lessons.description: Detailed study of the Apollo missions to the Moon.

lessons.name: Lunar Base Design
lessons.description: Concepts and challenges in designing a permanent base on the Moon.

lessons.name: Future Lunar Exploration
lessons.description: Exploring the future of human and robotic missions to the Moon.
